name: Emin Amirov
short-info: Full Stack Developer experienced in C# and ASP.NET Core, focused on clean code, scalable systems, and collaborative teamwork.
long-info: I'm a Full Stack Developer with practical experience in building scalable web applications using C# and ASP.NET Core. I work confidently across both backend and frontend, and I prioritize clean, maintainable code. I've led small teams, improved performance and code quality, and I believe that strong communication is just as crucial as solid architecture.
